/* 댓글 목록 조회 */
SELECT ROWNUM AS no , T1.REPLY_NO AS replyNo , T1.BOARD_NO AS boardNo , T1.REPLY_CONTENT AS replyContent , T1.REPLY_WRITER AS replyWriter , T1.REG_DATE AS regDate , T1.MOD_DATE AS modDate FROM ( SELECT REPLY_NO , BOARD_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , REPLY_WRITER , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM REPLY_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC ) T1

/* 댓글 상세 조회 */ SELECT REPLY_NO AS replyNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , REPLY_CONTENT AS replyContent , REPLY_WRITER AS replyWriter , REG_DATE AS regDate , MOD_DATE AS modDate FROM REPLY_INFO WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
